data.text:
@shaunviljoen @gillianoberholzer from our discussion with Diane yesterday. 

For now I've done the following:

1. I've enabled the Quick Search for some multi's also, excluding Properties and Documents since we don't have enough information yet to perform the search.

2. The tabs will now hide if there are no options available in the list.

3. Fixed a Trust bug as well where CSI Trust searches were not building as an option to DO Trust results.
